byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and NIDA NAJAR

headline.main: Sufi Muslim Leader Killed in Latest Hacking Attack in Bangladesh

snippet: The police said it was too early to say whether the attack was done by Islamist militants, who have claimed responsibility for several such killings recently.
lead_paragraph: The police said it was too early to say whether the attack was done by Islamist militants, who have claimed responsibility for several such killings recently.
